description: Detects suspicious DNS queries to external service interaction domains often used for out-of-band interactions after successful RCE
name: DNS Query to External Service Interaction Domains
query: dns.question.name:(*.interact.sh* OR *.oast.pro* OR *.oast.live* OR *.oast.site* OR *.oast.online* OR *.oast.fun* OR *.oast.me* OR *.burpcollaborator.net* OR *.oastify.com* OR *.canarytokens.com* OR *.requestbin.net* OR *.dnslog.cn*)
author: Florian Roth
